title: Know your friends, know your enemies
creator_credit: Crowsfoot Films, Peter Gray and Garry Lane
brief_description: The LaTrobe Valley power workers’ strike in 1977 seriously crippled the State of Victoria. This film analyses the causes of the collapse of a just and seemingly invincible strike through a combination of personal accounts and archival footage.
creator_credit_for_label: Crowsfoot Films, Peter Gray and Garry Lane
description: The LaTrobe Valley power workers’ strike in 1977 seriously crippled the State of Victoria. This film analyses the causes of the collapse of a just and seemingly invincible strike through a combination of personal accounts and archival footage.
